mods.abstract: Map showing subdivisions of properties from South Boulevard to South Baton Rouge and from the Mississippi River to Perkins Road. Shows landowners' names and extent of property. Map heavily creased, torn, and faded from age and use. Annotated in pencil. Some lettering illegible. Embossed with Reiner Swart's registered professional engineer stamp. 'Baton Rouge, La. Oct. 1908.'--Title block. Scale 1:1800.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

mods.note: William Waller Survey Collection, Mss. 3592, 3910, 4326, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, La.
